markdownRemark.html:
Via http://nymag.com/daily/sports/2009/11/itispossiblethepriceofdo.html<

“An ‘unnamed Canadian company’ has bought the Pontiac Silverdome … for $583,000.” There’s a joke about the Lions in there somewhere, but wow, how much trouble is Detroit in these days?

frontmatter.title: The Pontiac Silverdome was Sold for < $600k
Time for Your Easy Joke About Courtney Love
